name: WorkForces
description:
Workforces is a project created for a videogame development career.

It is a procedural Tactical RPG game, where you have to defeat the evil robots who want to oppress you.

Programmer: Adrián Bayardi

3D Artist: Nicolás Oliver (https://www.artstation.com/ole2)

2D Artist: Andrés Latorres

Animations from: https://www.mixamo.com/
